hero.subtitle: Licensed language professionals with experience in documents for immigration processes, studies, and work. Carefully reviewed translations with professional accuracy and attention to detail.

item1.title: Personalized attention
item1.desc: We guide you throughout the process: we answer your questions and tailor your translation to the goal of your procedure.

item2.title: Accurate legal terminology
item2.desc: Language professionals experienced in legal, academic, and immigration terminology. Carefully crafted translations with no ambiguities.

item3.title: Fast and reliable delivery
item3.desc: Clear timelines from the start and on-time delivery so you can move forward without delays.

item4.title: Accepted by institutions
item4.desc: Translations that meet common requirements requested by universities, embassies, notaries, and companies.

item5.title: Professional seal
item5.desc: We include the seal and signature of licensed language professionals. If needed, we can coordinate legal support for authentications.

item6.title: Guaranteed confidentiality
item6.desc: Your documents contain important information. We handle them with complete discretion and secure management.

service.description: We translate and review legal documents originating in English, ensuring legal accuracy and compliance with Salvadoran institutional requirements. Our team consists of licensed language professionals with extensive experience in legal terminology, contracts, immigration documents, and more. We do not use AI: every translation is 100% human to ensure precision and validity.

card.alt: Professional legal translators in El Salvador
card.name: Certified Translator Team
card.specialityValue: Contracts, certificates, deeds, powers of attorney

services.subtitle: We support you with professional document translation, live interpretation, and website translation in multiple languages, provided by licensed language professionals.

documents.title: Document translation
documents.text: Certificates, records, contracts, letters, resumes, immigration and academic documents. All reviewed with a legal and procedural focus.

live.title: Live translation / interpretation
live.text: Support for interviews, meetings, consular appointments, calls, or video calls where you need help in two languages.

web.title: Website translation
web.text: We adapt your website content into other languages, preserving a professional tone, message clarity, and user experience.

items.question: What translation services do you offer?
items.answer: We offer document translation, website and digital content translation (SEO), as well as live interpretation for meetings, events, or specific procedures.

items.question: Which languages do you work with?
items.answer: We work with English, French, Italian, and Chinese, depending on the client's needs and the type of project.

items.question: Who performs the translations?
items.answer: Translations are performed by licensed language professionals with academic training and experience in document translation and formal communication.

items.question: How long does a translation take?
items.answer: Delivery time depends on the type and volume of the document. Most standard translations are delivered within 2 to 3 business days. We also offer urgent services upon coordination.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept payment via bank transfer or payment upon delivery. A prior deposit is required to begin any service.

items.question: Is a deposit required to start the translation?
items.answer: Yes. To begin the document translation process, website translation (SEO), or live interpretation, a deposit is required as service confirmation.

items.question: Where are translated documents delivered?
items.answer: Documents are delivered at our offices located in Colonia Flor Blanca, San Salvador. We can also send scanned documents in digital format if requested by the client.

items.question: Can I send my documents digitally?
items.answer: Yes. You can send us your documents as a clear scan or PDF for review and quotation.

items.question: How do I request a quote?
items.answer: You can send us your document or the link to the website you want translated. We review it and send you a personalized, no-obligation quote.

ctaHero.titleLine2: and receive a quote within hours
ctaHero.subtitle: Share your file as a PDF or a clear photo. We review your document and send you the price, timeline, and next steps, with no obligation.

footer.description: Professional translation services for documents, websites, and live interpretation, provided by licensed language professionals.

liveHero.subtitle: We support you in real time during supplier meetings, important meetings, and calls, with professional interpretation in English and Chinese.

liveCta.eyebrow: DO YOU HAVE AN INTERVIEW OR APPOINTMENT?
liveCta.subtitle: Tell us the date, the language, and the type of meeting. We confirm availability and pricing before scheduling.

liveLanguages.title: Connecting cultures
liveLanguages.subtitle: Professional interpretation services in the most in-demand languages for procedures, studies, and business.

cards.variant: Mandarin for business and international meetings
specialties: Support for business procedures and documentation

liveHowItWorks.title: How it works
liveHowItWorks.subtitle: A simple process and professional support at every stage of your appointment or meeting.

steps.title: Book your service
steps.description: Share the date, time, language, and meeting type. We confirm availability.

steps.title: Interpreter confirmation
steps.description: We assign a professional interpreter with experience in the type of procedure or meeting you will have.

steps.title: Live connection
steps.description: We join via video call or phone call and support you throughout the entire conversation.

steps.title: Ongoing support
steps.description: If you need clarifications before or after the meeting, we help ensure everything is clear.

webHero.subtitle: We adapt your website content into other languages while preserving your tone, message, and style. Increase your global reach with clear, natural, SEO-optimized translations.

webCta.subtitle: We adapt your content into other languages while maintaining your tone, style, and branding. Clear, natural, SEO-optimized translations.
webCta.primaryButton: I want to translate my site

webHowItWorks.title: How your website translation works
webHowItWorks.subtitle: A clear, professional process with support at every step to ensure your site is ready for the international market.

steps.title: Share your website with us
steps.description: Send us your website URL or the site files. We review the structure, content volume, and required languages.

steps.title: Receive a quote and estimated timeline
steps.description: We analyze your website and send an exact price along with the delivery timeline and project scope.

steps.title: Upfront payment to get started
steps.description: We begin the translation once the service is confirmed and the initial project payment is completed.

steps.title: Final delivery + revisions
steps.description: We deliver the translation ready to publish. Includes 2 rounds of revisions to ensure tone, style, and accuracy.

items.title: Increase your reach
items.description: Connect with millions of users who prefer content in their own language.

items.title: Better international SEO
items.description: Optimized translations to improve your global search ranking.

items.title: Higher conversion
items.description: Users understand your message better when it is in their native language.

items.title: Professional credibility
items.description: Content translated by experts in digital communication.

liveBenefits.title: Benefits of live translation and interpretation

items.title: Clear communication
items.description: Avoid misunderstandings during important meetings or interviews.

items.title: Expert professionals
items.description: Interpreters with native-level proficiency in English and Chinese.

items.title: Full support
items.description: We are with you before, during, and after the meeting.

items.title: Greater confidence
items.description: Speak confidently in any situation or procedure.

aboutUsHero.subtitle: We are a team of licensed language professionals with extensive experience and international certifications, committed to delivering precise translations of exceptional quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide exceptionally accurate translation services that exceed our clients’ expectations. We are committed to preserving the essence and tone of each document, ensuring that every word becomes an open door between cultures and languages.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be recognized leaders in professional translation solutions, enabling global communication and connecting diverse communities through linguistic excellence. We envision a world where language barriers do not limit opportunities.

team.title: Our Team
team.text: We have professional translators licensed in languages from accredited universities. Each team member brings hands-on experience across sectors such as legal, technical, medical, and business. Our dedication to excellence ensures reliable and accurate translations for your most important projects.

certifications.title: International Certifications
certifications.description: Our team holds certifications from prestigious international organizations, validating our expertise and exceptional language proficiency. Each team member keeps their credentials up to date.

items.name: TOEFL
items.fullName: Test of English as a Foreign Language
items.notes: Globally recognized to validate academic and professional English proficiency.

items.name: TOEIC
items.fullName: Test of English for International Communication
items.notes: Certification focused on business and professional English.

items.name: IELTS
items.notes: International standard for higher education, migration, and professional employment.

items.name: DALF / DELF
items.notes: Official certification of French language proficiency.

items.name: DELE
items.fullName: Diploma of Spanish as a Foreign Language

quoteCalculator.description: Fill in your document details and get an estimated price. At the end, you can send the quote via WhatsApp and share your file.

form.pagesHelp: Count each side with content as one page. Example: a sheet written on one side = 1 page; a sheet written on both sides = 2 pages. If your document includes stamps, tables, or complex scans, the final price may vary.

summary.estimatedText: Final amounts may vary depending on document complexity, technical terminology, formatting, and the requirements of the requesting institution.

whatsapp.note: When sending the quote via WhatsApp, you can share your document as a PDF or photo to confirm the final price.
